data.name: Nightster
data.financialDisclaimer: *Financing Offer available only on new Harley-Davidson® motorcycles financed through Eaglemark Savings Bank (ESB) and is subject to credit approval. Not all applicants will qualify. This 8.99% offer is available on new Harley Davidson® motorcycles to high credit tier customers at ESB and only for up to an 84-month term. The APR may vary based on the applicant’s past credit performance and the term of the loan. For example, a 2023 Nightster® motorcycle in Vivid Black with an MSRP of $13,499, a 10% down payment and amount financed of $12,149.10, 84-month repayment term, and 8.99% APR results in monthly payments of $195.41. In this example, customer is responsible for applicable taxes, title, licensing fees and any other fees or charges at the time of sale. APR is calculated according to the simple interest method. Not valid in conjunction with other offers. Other terms, conditions, and limitations may apply. Dealer participation may vary. Financing offer is subject to change or cancellation at any time. See your Harley-Davidson® Dealership for details.
data.description: Designed to inspire both new and experienced riders, the 2023 Nightster evolves the Sportster legacy into a nimble handling and confidence inspiring ride.

data.description: The 2023 CVO Road Glide Limited Anniversary model is an extremely limited, serialized custom bagger loaded with exclusive details, power and styling that celebrate 120 years of Harley-Davidson motorcycles. It’s the ultimate ride to the H-D Homecoming™ event.

data.name: Freewheeler
data.financialDisclaimer: *Financing Offer available only on new Harley-Davidson® motorcycles financed through Eaglemark Savings Bank (ESB) and is subject to credit approval. Not all applicants will qualify. This 12.54% offer is available on new Harley Davidson® motorcycles to high credit tier customers at ESB and only for up to an 96-month term. The APR may vary based on the applicant’s past credit performance and the term of the loan. For example, a 2023 Freewheeler™ motorcycle in Vivid Black with an MSRP of $29,999, a 10% down payment and amount financed of $26,999.10, 96-month repayment term, and 12.54% APR results in monthly payments of $446.86. In this example, customer is responsible for applicable taxes, title, licensing fees and any other fees or charges at the time of sale. APR is calculated according to the simple interest method. Not valid in conjunction with other offers. Other terms, conditions, and limitations may apply. Dealer participation may vary. Financing offer is subject to change or cancellation at any time.
